Class: ImageCaptureOptions

ImageCaptureOptions

new ImageCaptureOptions()

Options for image capture, used with the imageCapture method. All properties are optional.
Source:
  • ImageCaptureOptions.js, line 5

Members

antiAliasing :boolean

If true, the image result is anti-aliased. Default: false
Type:
  • boolean
Source:
  • ImageCaptureOptions.js, line 11

matte :boolean

If true, the artboard is matted with a color. Default: false
Type:
  • boolean
Source:
  • ImageCaptureOptions.js, line 17

matteColor :RGBColor

The color to use for the artboard matte. Default: white
Type:
  • RGBColor
Source:
  • ImageCaptureOptions.js, line 23

resolution :number

The resolution of the captured image file in points-per-inch (PPI), in the range [72.0 ... 2400.0]. Default: 150 (double)
Type:
  • number
Source:
  • ImageCaptureOptions.js, line 29

transparency :boolean

If true, the image result is transparent. Default: false
Type:
  • boolean
Source:
  • ImageCaptureOptions.js, line 36

typename :string

Read-only. The class name of the referenced object.
Type:
  • string
Source:
  • ImageCaptureOptions.js, line 42
